column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Some of the best ramen places in Houston. It might not be an original Houston restaurant
column2: but it pretty darn good enough to keep me coming back. The broth is pretty "heavy" though. The chasu has a very reasonable protein to fat ratio where it isn't too fatty. The takoyaki was some of the best I've had thus far (take it with a grain of salt though as I have only had like three other places.) though it was kind of expensive in my opinion.
